name: Banana Pancakes
instructions: 1. Mash the banana in a bowl. 2. Add flour, sugar, baking powder, and cinnamon, then mix well. 3. In another bowl, whisk the egg, milk, and vanilla extract. 4. Combine the wet and dry ingredients, mixing until smooth. 5. Heat butter in a pan, pour small amounts of batter to form pancakes. 6. Cook until bubbles form on top, then flip and cook the other side. 7. Serve warm with honey, maple syrup, or sliced bananas.

name: Classic Pancakes
instructions: 1. In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. 2. In another bowl, whisk eggs, milk, and melted butter. 3. Combine wet and dry ingredients. 4. Heat a pan and pour batter to form pancakes. 5. Cook until bubbles form, then flip. 6. Serve with syrup.

name: Masala Dosa
instructions: 1. Soak rice and urad dal overnight, then grind into a smooth batter. 2. Let it ferment for 8 hours, then add salt. 3. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, chopped onions, and green chili. 4. Add mashed potatoes, turmeric, and salt, then cook for 5 minutes. 5. Heat a pan, spread dosa batter thinly, cook until crispy. 6. Add the potato filling and fold the dosa. 7. Serve with coconut chutney and sambar.

name: Chole Bhature
instructions: 1. Soak chickpeas overnight and boil them until soft. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté chopped onions and ginger-garlic paste. 3. Add tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, salt, and cook until soft. 4. Add chickpeas and garam masala, cook for 10 minutes. 5. For bhature, mix flour, yogurt, and baking soda into a dough. 6. Roll into small discs and deep fry until golden. 7. Serve hot with chole.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: 1. Heat butter in a pan and sauté chopped onions until golden brown. 2. Add ginger-garlic paste, chopped tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, and salt. 3. Cook until tomatoes turn soft, then blend into a smooth paste. 4. Pour the mixture back into the pan and add cream. 5. Add paneer cubes and garam masala, then simmer for 5 minutes. 6. Serve hot with naan or rice.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: 1. Toast bread slices. 2. Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. 3. Spread avocado mixture on toast. 4. Serve with optional toppings like eggs or tomatoes.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti in salted water. 2. In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy. 3. In a bowl, whisk eggs, parmesan, and pepper. 4. Drain spaghetti and mix with pancetta. 5. Remove from heat and mix with egg mixture. 6. Serve hot.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: 1. Butter one side of each bread slice. 2. Place cheese between slices, buttered side out. 3. Heat a pan and grill the sandwich until golden brown. 4. Flip and cook the other side. 5. Serve warm.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions until golden. 2. Add garlic and ginger paste. 3. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. 4. Add spices and mix well. 5. Add chicken and cook for 15 minutes. 6. Add water and simmer until chicken is cooked. 7. Serve with rice.

name: Beef Stir Fry
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add garlic and sauté. 3. Add beef and cook for 5 minutes. 4. Add vegetables and sauces. 5. Stir-fry for another 5 minutes. 6. Serve hot with rice or noodles.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Mix butter and sugar. 3. Add egg and vanilla extract. 4. Mix flour, baking soda, and chocolate chips. 5. Form dough balls and place on baking sheet. 6. Bake for 10-12 minutes. 7. Let cool before serving.

name: Banana Smoothie
instructions: 1. Add all ingredients to a blender. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Pour into a glass and serve chilled.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: 1. Chop lettuce. 2. Mix with croutons, parmesan, and dressing. 3. Toss well and serve fresh.

name: Mango Ice Cream
instructions: 1. Blend mangoes with sugar until smooth. 2. Whip cream until soft peaks form. 3. Mix mango puree with whipped cream. 4. Freeze for 4 hours. 5. Serve cold.

name: French Toast
instructions: 1. In a bowl, whisk eggs, milk, and cinnamon. 2. Dip bread slices into the mixture, coating both sides. 3. Heat butter in a pan and cook bread until golden brown on both sides. 4. Serve warm with maple syrup.

name: Oatmeal with Fruits
instructions: 1. Boil milk and add oats. 2. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. 3. Pour into a bowl, add honey, banana, and berries. 4. Sprinkle nuts on top and serve.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: 1. Chop vegetables. 2. In a pot, heat broth and add vegetables. 3. Simmer for 20 minutes. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Serve hot.

name: BBQ Chicken Sandwich
instructions: 1. Cook chicken in a pan until fully cooked. 2. Shred chicken and mix with BBQ sauce. 3. Toast buns and add chicken mixture. 4. Top with coleslaw and serve.

name: Biryani
instructions: 1. Cook rice separately. 2. In a pan, sauté onion and ginger-garlic paste. 3. Add chicken, tomatoes, yogurt, and spices. 4. Layer rice over the chicken mixture. 5. Cover and cook for 10 minutes. 6. Serve hot.

name: Salmon with Lemon Butter
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Melt butter and mix with garlic and lemon juice. 3. Brush salmon with the mixture. 4. Bake for 12-15 minutes. 5. Serve hot.

name: Brownies
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Melt butter and mix with sugar. 3. Add eggs and vanilla. 4. Mix in flour and cocoa powder. 5. Pour into a baking dish and bake for 20 minutes. 6. Let cool before serving.

name: Fruit Salad
instructions: 1. Chop all fruits into bite-sized pieces. 2. Drizzle with honey and lemon juice. 3. Mix well and serve chilled.

name: Garlic Bread
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Mix butter, garlic, and parsley. 3. Spread on bread slices. 4. Bake for 10 minutes. 5. Serve warm.

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
instructions: 1. Mix crushed biscuits with melted butter. 2. Press into a cake pan to form the crust. 3. Mix cream cheese and sugar. 4. Spread over crust. 5. Top with sliced strawberries. 6. Chill for 2 hours before serving.

name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: 1. Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper in a bowl. 2. Melt butter in a pan over low heat. 3. Pour egg mixture into the pan. 4. Stir gently until eggs are cooked but still soft. 5. Serve warm.

name: Mushroom Omelette
instructions: 1. Heat butter in a pan and sauté mushrooms. 2. In a bowl, whisk eggs and salt. 3. Pour eggs over mushrooms and cook until set. 4. Sprinkle cheese on top. 5. Fold omelette and serve.

name: Vegetable Wrap
instructions: 1. Spread hummus on tortilla. 2. Add lettuce, carrots, and cucumbers. 3. Roll tightly and slice in half. 4. Serve fresh.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
instructions: 1. Place grilled chicken, lettuce, cheese, and dressing on a tortilla. 2. Roll tightly and slice in half. 3. Serve fresh or grilled.

name: Butter Chicken
instructions: 1. Sauté onions in butter. 2. Add tomatoes and blend into a sauce. 3. Cook chicken with spices in the sauce. 4. Stir in cream and simmer for 5 minutes. 5. Serve with rice or naan.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: 1. Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds. 2. Cook beef and onions until browned. 3. Mix beef with rice, salt, and pepper. 4. Stuff peppers with the mixture. 5. Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.

name: Lemon Tart
instructions: 1. Mix flour, butter, and sugar to form crust. 2. Bake crust at 180°C for 10 minutes. 3. Mix eggs and lemon juice. 4. Pour into crust and bake for another 15 minutes. 5. Let cool before serving.

name: Granola Bars
instructions: 1. Mix oats, honey, and peanut butter. 2. Stir in nuts and raisins. 3. Press mixture into a pan and refrigerate for 2 hours. 4. Cut into bars and serve.

name: Deviled Eggs
instructions: 1. Boil eggs and cut in half. 2. Remove yolks and mix with mayo and mustard. 3. Fill egg whites with yolk mixture. 4. Sprinkle paprika on top and serve.

name: Tiramisu
instructions: 1. Mix mascarpone and sugar. 2. Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer in a dish. 3. Spread mascarpone mixture over. 4. Repeat layers and dust with cocoa powder. 5. Chill for 4 hours before serving.

name: Blueberry Muffins
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder. 3. Add melted butter, milk, and egg, stirring well. 4. Fold in blueberries. 5. Pour into muffin cups and bake for 20 minutes.

name: Spinach & Cheese Omelette
instructions: 1. Heat butter in a pan and sauté spinach. 2. Whisk eggs and salt, then pour into the pan. 3. Add cheese on top and cook until set. 4. Fold and serve warm.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
instructions: 1. Sauté onions and garlic. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes. 3. Pour in vegetable broth and simmer for 15 minutes. 4. Blend until smooth, add basil, and serve hot.

name: Veggie Stir-Fry
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and stir-fry onions. 2. Add broccoli, carrots, and bell pepper. 3. Cook for 5 minutes, then add soy sauce. 4. Stir well and serve with rice or noodles.

name: Grilled Steak
instructions: 1. Rub steak with oil and seasonings. 2. Heat a grill pan and cook steak for 4 minutes per side. 3. Let rest for 5 minutes before slicing.

name: Shrimp Pasta
instructions: 1. Cook pasta in boiling water. 2. In a pan, sauté garlic in butter. 3. Add shrimp and cook until pink. 4. Pour in cream and simmer for 2 minutes. 5. Mix with pasta and serve.

name: Chocolate Pudding
instructions: 1. In a pot, mix milk, sugar, cocoa, and cornstarch. 2. Heat and stir until thickened. 3. Remove from heat, add vanilla, and cool. 4. Serve chilled.

name: Popcorn
instructions: 1. Heat butter in a pot. 2. Add kernels and cover. 3. Shake occasionally until popping stops. 4. Sprinkle salt and serve.

name: Guacamole
instructions: 1. Mash avocados in a bowl. 2. Add chopped tomato and onion. 3. Mix in lime juice and salt. 4. Serve with chips.

name: Apple Pie
instructions: 1. Slice apples and mix with sugar and cinnamon. 2. Make dough with flour and butter. 3. Roll out and place in a pie dish. 4. Fill with apples and cover with dough. 5. Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

name: Pancakes
instructions: 1. Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder. 2. Add egg, milk, and melted butter, whisking until smooth. 3. Heat a pan and pour batter to form pancakes. 4. Cook until bubbles form, then flip. 5. Serve with syrup.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: 1. Chop cucumber, tomato, and onion. 2. Add feta cheese and olives. 3. Drizzle with olive oil and mix well. 4. Serve chilled.

name: Tuna Sandwich
instructions: 1. Mix tuna with mayonnaise and black pepper. 2. Spread on bread slices. 3. Add lettuce and close sandwich. 4. Serve fresh.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: 1. Sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 3. Add chicken and curry powder, stirring well. 4. Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes. 5. Serve with rice.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: 1. Cook beef with salt, pepper, and chili powder. 2. Fill taco shells with beef mixture. 3. Top with lettuce and cheese. 4. Serve warm.

name: Nachos with Cheese
instructions: 1. Arrange tortilla chips on a plate. 2. Sprinkle cheese on top. 3. Microwave for 30 seconds or until cheese melts. 4. Add salsa and jalapeños before serving.

name: Hummus
instructions: 1. Blend chickpeas, tahini, olive oil, lemon juice, and salt until smooth. 2. Serve with pita bread or veggies.

name: Mango Smoothie
instructions: 1. Peel and chop mango. 2. Blend mango with yogurt, milk, and honey until smooth. 3. Serve chilled.
